headline: ASML Holding N.V. (ASML): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on ASML Holding N.V. on Arya’s Substack by Arya. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on ASML. ASML Holding N.V.’s share was trading at $1,454.59 as of January 27th. ASML’s trailing and forward P/E were 50.55 and 45.66 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. ASML Holding N.V. headline: AMAT stock: Mizuho sees ‘significant acceleration’ in WFE, upgrades rating
summary: Investing.com -- Applied Materials received an upgrade from Mizuho on Wednesday, with the firm citing a sharp rebound in semiconductor capital spending and strengthening foundry and logic demand.

headline: Ultra Clean Appoints Robert Wunar as Chief Operating Officer
summary: Ultra Clean Holdings, Inc. (Nasdaq: UCTT) today announced that Harjinder Bajwa has departed the company effective January 25, 2026, and that Robert Wunar has been appointed Chief Operating Officer effective March 23, 2026.

headline: Applied Materials Weighs AI Upside Against Valuation And Regulatory Risks
summary: Applied Materials (NasdaqGS:AMAT) is seeing fresh attention as AI driven demand for semiconductor manufacturing gear supports six consecutive years of growth and operational streamlining. Recent analyst upgrades and strong sector peer results have highlighted the company’s role in supplying equipment for expanding AI infrastructure. Regulatory and trade restrictions remain a headwind for wafer fabrication equipment providers, even as global AI investments continue to build. Applied...
